page.title: 05A Day In My Life.
page.content: I wake up in the morning and go to the loo. Then I have my breakfast and a cup of tea. For breakfast I usually have cereal and toast. I have a wash, clean my teeth and get dressed for school. I take my school bag with my reading books and my recorder in it. When I get to school we have assembly. The teacher talks to us and we sing songs and tell our news. Usually we do our maths and writing and go out to play. At dinner time I have my packed lunch -sandwiches or a roll and fruit. Sometimes I have crisps or yoghurt. At the end of school my mum takes me home and I have a drink and a biscuit. When it is nice weather I play in the garden with my brother or my friend. I have a bike and a sandpit and a swing. Sometimes I watch television and then I have my tea. It is usually a cooked meal like meat and cabbage and
